verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> also came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, thou dwellest<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, which have eyes<WH5869> to see<WH7200>, and see<WH7200> not; they have ears<WH241> to hear<WH8085>, and hear<WH8085> not: for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.

Therefore, thou son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, prepare<WH6213> thee stuff<WH3627> for removing<WH1473>, and remove<WH1540> by day<WH3119> in their sight<WH5869>; and thou shalt remove<WH1540> from thy place<WH4725> to another<WH312> place<WH4725> in their sight<WH5869>: it may be they will consider<WH7200>, though they be a rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>.

Then shalt thou bring forth<WH3318> thy stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119> in their sight<WH5869>, as stuff<WH3627> for removing<WH1473>: and thou shalt go forth<WH3318> at even<WH6153> in their sight<WH5869>, as they that go forth<WH4161> into captivity<WH1473>.
Dig<WH2864> thou through the wall<WH7023> in their sight<WH5869>, and carry out<WH3318> thereby.

In their sight<WH5869> shalt thou bear<WH5375> it upon thy shoulders<WH3802>, and carry it forth<WH3318> in the twilight<WH5939>: thou shalt cover<WH3680> thy face<WH6440>, that thou see<WH7200> not the ground<WH776>: for I have set<WH5414> thee for a sign<WH4159> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

And I did<WH6213> so as I was commanded<WH6680>: I brought forth<WH3318> my stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119>, as stuff<WH3627> for captivity<WH1473>, and in the even<WH6153> I digged<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> with mine hand<WH3027>; I brought it forth<WH3318> in the twilight<WH5939>, and I bare<WH5375> it upon my shoulder<WH3802> in their sight<WH5869>.
¶ And in the morning<WH1242> came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, hath not the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, the rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, said<WH559> unto thee, What doest<WH6213> thou?

Say<WH559> thou unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; This burden<WH4853> concerneth the prince<WH5387> in Jerusalem<WH3389>, and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> that are among<WH8432> them.
Say<WH559>, I am your sign<WH4159>: like as I have done<WH6213>, so shall it be done<WH6213> unto them: they shall remove<WH1473> and go<WH3212> into captivity<WH7628>.

And the prince<WH5387> that is among<WH8432> them shall bear<WH5375> upon his shoulder<WH3802> in the twilight<WH5939>, and shall go forth<WH3318>: they shall dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> to carry out<WH3318> thereby: he shall cover<WH3680> his face<WH6440>, that<WH3282> he see<WH7200> not the ground<WH776> with his eyes<WH5869>.

My net<WH7568> also will I spread<WH6566> upon him, and he shall be taken<WH8610> in my snare<WH4686>: and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon<WH894> to the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>; yet shall he not see<WH7200> it, though he shall die<WH4191> there.
And I will scatter<WH2219> toward every wind<WH7307> all that are about<WH5439> him to help<WH5828> him, and all his bands<WH102>; and I will draw out<WH7324> the sword<WH2719> after<WH310> them.
And they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I shall scatter<WH6327> them among the nations<WH1471>, and disperse<WH2219> them in the countries<WH776>.

But I will leave<WH3498> a few<WH4557> men<WH582> of them from the sword<WH2719>, from the famine<WH7458>, and from the pestilence<WH1698>; that they may declare<WH5608> all their abominations<WH8441> among the heathen<WH1471> whither they come<WH935>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
¶ Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came to me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, eat<WH398> thy bread<WH3899> with quaking<WH7494>, and drink<WH8354> thy water<WH4325> with trembling<WH7269> and with carefulness<WH1674>;

And say<WH559> unto the people<WH5971> of the land<WH127>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and of the land<WH776> of Israel<WH3478>; They shall eat<WH398> their bread<WH3899> with carefulness<WH1674>, and drink<WH8354> their water<WH4325> with astonishment<WH8078>, that her land<WH776> may be desolate<WH3456> from all that is therein<WH4393>, because of the violence<WH2555> of all them that dwell<WH3427> therein.
And the cities<WH5892> that are inhabited<WH3427> shall be laid waste<WH2717>, and the land<WH776> shall be desolate<WH8077>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.
¶ And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,
Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, what is that proverb<WH4912> that ye have in the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, The days<WH3117> are prolonged<WH748>, and every vision<WH2377> faileth<WH6>?

Tell<WH559> them therefore, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; I will make this proverb<WH4912> to cease<WH7673>, and they shall no more use it as a proverb<WH4911> in Israel<WH3478>; but say<WH1696> unto them, The days<WH3117> are at hand<WH7126>, and the effect<WH1697> of every vision<WH2377>.
For there shall be no more any vain<WH7723> vision<WH2377> nor flattering<WH2509> divination<WH4738> within<WH8432> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

For I am the LORD<WH3068>: I will speak<WH1696>, and the word<WH1697> that I shall speak<WH1696> shall come to pass<WH6213>; it shall be no more prolonged<WH4900>: for in your days<WH3117>, O rebellious<WH4805> house<WH1004>, will I say<WH1696> the word<WH1697>, and will perform<WH6213> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
¶ Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came to me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, behold, they of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> say<WH559>, The vision<WH2377> that he seeth<WH2372> is for many<WH7227> days<WH3117> to come, and he prophesieth<WH5012> of the times<WH6256> that are far<WH7350> off.

Therefore say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; There shall none of my words<WH1697> be prolonged<WH4900> any more, but the word<WH1697> which I have spoken<WH1696> shall be done<WH6213>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
